paragraphs: Hi! I'm Noelí Pacio, a voiceover artist and multimedia designer. I'm finishing my degree in Multimedia Technology, an experience that has allowed me to explore my passion for marketing, communication, and audiovisual design.
My goal is to create projects that inspire, communicate, and make an impact.
When I'm not designing or recording, I love diving into the world of creativity, always ready to transform ideas into unique experiences.
name: Noelí Pacio
